Params: Phew, is it time for research?
Gray Raven? The name seems to have appeared in the information I just uploaded... forget it.
It doesn't matter what it is if I can do my research.
I study biochemistry, so I could tell it the moment you showed up. You are not living organisms, except for that one, right?
Mechanoid... not the most interesting research field for me, but the thought of carrying out research that I haven't been able to do for a long time made me excited!
The white-haired lady over there, could you open your head for me?
...Are you seriously thinking about opening your head?
Ah, is it a non-removable part? Biological self-healing, proliferation, division, none of them can be done? What a bummer...
Where's my scalpel? Oh wait, what are the tools for surgical operations now, the chainsaw, drill, or the harvester?
Damn, the test isn't over yet!
...Calm down and think about it, she couldn't possibly touch anything right now.
Turns out that's how it is...
As the data says, this is how I'm like...
I can't do experiments or pick up scalpels and dispensers anymore...
Liv, she just tried to cut your head open.
Can I have one of those mechanical bodies like yours?
The shape doesn't matter, as long as I can pick up a harvester, chainsaw, or drill. If not, a scalpel or dispenser will do.
Commandant, I've got a different opinion.
We're facing severe problems in terms of technical aspects, application approval or follow-ups.
But... could you please assist us as tactical memory?
Your experience data is quite valuable for us...
Since my lovely subject asked, I'll agree to it. But...
Forget it, she won't open her head for you.
...Memory: Heisen. Test passed and recycle completed.
